channel.title: CVE Feed for Dulldusk -- PHP File Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dulldusk -- PHP File Manager

item.title: CVE-2024-5673|2024-06-06T13:11:04.381Z -- dulldusk -- php%20file%20manager
item.description: Vulnerability in Dulldusk's PHP File Manager affecting version 1.7.8. This vulnerability consists of an XSS through the fm_current_dir parameter of index.php. An attacker could send a specially crafted JavaScript payload to an authenticated user and partially hijack their browser session.

item.title: CVE-2024-5673|2024-06-06T10:19:34.669Z -- dulldusk -- php%20file%20manager
item.description: Vulnerability in Dulldusk's PHP File Manager affecting version 1.7.8. This vulnerability consists of an XSS through the fm_current_dir parameter of index.php. An attacker could send a specially crafted JavaScript payload to an authenticated user and partially hijack their browser session.
